Odera Olivia Orji // (na-ege ntị) bụ onye Naijirịa na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri.
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri nke Odera Olivia Orji malitere mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri 2012 "Last flight to Abuja"

Ọrụ ya batara n'ìhè mgbe ọ pụtara dị ka onye "Udo" na usoro telivịshọn MNET Africa Jemeji
O meela ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, gụnyere Obsession, The Father, Blue, Fifty, Kayanmata, Bedroom Points, na Just a Fling.
N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya maka Best of Nollywood Awards maka Best Kiss na ihe nkiri n'akụkụ Mawuli Gavor
Olivia na-eje ozi dị ka onye mgbasa ozi na onye na-emepụta ihe na Eureka Media Services na onye enyemaka onye nduzi, mmepe ọdịnaya, ọrụ uche Story Consultancy na Productions.
